titles: An account of what happen'd in the kingdom of Sweden in the years 1669, and 1670 and upwards In relation to some persons that were accused for witches; and tryed and executed by the Kings command. Together with the particulars of a very sad accident that befel a boy at Malmoe in Schonen in the year, 1678. by the means of witchcraft, attested by the ablest and most judicious men of that town.  Both translated out of High-Dutch into English, By Anthony Horneck D.D.
author: Horneck, Anthony, 1641-1697.
notes: Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
keywords: Sweden --  History --  17th century --  Early works to 1800.
